channel.title: Where is a Dropping Method Located?
channel.description:
I need to know where my dropping method would be located in my server, I don't think I have one, so I might have to use another source's dropping method.
Thanks.

item.title: Where is a Dropping Method Located?
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

haha, thanks sooo much.lol and belive me. deathschaos9 has done everything under the sun to help me. He’s even teamviewed me haha. but thanks for you’re help.

item.title: Where is a Dropping Method Located?

item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

right…

ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[slot] - 1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[slot], playerId, false); // createGroundItem(droppedItem, absX, absY, c); deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]); updateRequired = true; savegame(false); } }

and for the other one… (I think…)

[code]public void replaceitem2(int oldID, int newID) {

for(int i2 = 0; i2 < playerItems.length; i2++)
{
if(playerItems[i2] == oldID+1)
{
int newamount = playerItemsN[i2];
deleteItem(oldID, getItemSlot(oldID), playerItemsN[i2]);
ItemHandler.addItem(newID, absX, absY, newamount, playerId, false);
}
}
}[/code]

public static void spawnItem(int itemID, int itemX, int itemY, int itemAmount, int playerFor) { client person = (client) PlayerHandler.players[playerFor]; person.createGroundItem(itemID, itemX, itemY, itemAmount); }

and I couldn’t find the other one

right duh. lol does anything look wrong here to you?

[code]public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot) {
// misc.printlnTag(“droppeditem [”+playerItems[slot]+"] which is
// ["+(droppedItem+1)+"]");
boolean a = true;

if(playerName == null)
return;
if(droppedItem == 4045 && !isInJail()){
deleteItem(4045, 1);
dealDamage(15);
hitDiff = 15;
plrText = “Ouch!”;
plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
updateRequired = true;
hitUpdateRequired = true;
setAnimation(827);
return;
}[/code]
